verses.verse: The beginning <S%G746><s%> of the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

As it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the prophets, <S%G4396><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> my messenger <S%G32><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> your face, <S%G4383><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall prepare <S%G2680><s%> your way <S%G3598><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you.

The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> you the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> his paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>

John <S%G2491><s%> did baptize <S%G907><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> and preach <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for the remission <S%G859><s%> of sins. <S%G266><s%>

And there went <S%G1607><s%> out to him all <S%G3956><s%> the land <S%G5561><s%> of Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> and they of Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and were all <S%G3956><s%> baptized <S%G907><s%> of him in the river <S%G4215><s%> of Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> confessing <S%G1843><s%> their sins. <S%G266><s%>

And John <S%G2491><s%> was clothed <S%G1746><s%> with camel's <S%G2574><s%> hair, <S%G2359><s%> and with a girdle <S%G2223><s%> of a skin <S%G1193><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> his loins; <S%G3751><s%> and he did eat <S%G2068><s%> locusts <S%G200><s%> and wild <S%G66><s%> honey; <S%G3192><s%>

And preached, <S%G2784><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> There comes <S%G2064><s%> one mightier <S%G2478><s%> than I after <S%G3694><s%> me, the lace <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G2425><s%> to stoop <S%G2955><s%> down and unloose. <S%G3089><s%>
I indeed <S%G3303><s%> have baptized <S%G907><s%> you with water: <S%G5204><s%> but he shall baptize <S%G907><s%> you with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass in those <S%G1565><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> from Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and was baptized <S%G907><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> in Jordan. <S%G2446><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> coming <S%G305><s%> up out of the water, <S%G5204><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> the heavens <S%G3772><s%> opened, <S%G4977><s%> and the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> descending <S%G2597><s%> on him:

And there came <S%G1096><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> saying, You are <S%G1488><s%> my beloved <S%G27><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> in whom <S%G3739><s%> I am well <S%G2106><s%> pleased. <S%G2106><s%>
And immediately <S%G2117><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> drives <S%G1544><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And he was there <S%G1563><s%> in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> tempted <S%G3985><s%> of Satan; <S%G4567><s%> and was with the wild <S%G2342><s%> beasts; <S%G2342><s%> and the angels <S%G32><s%> ministered <S%G1247><s%> to him.

Now <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that John <S%G2491><s%> was put <S%G3860><s%> in prison, <S%G3860><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%>

And saying, <S%G3004><s%> The time <S%G2540><s%> is fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> and the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is at <S%G1448><s%> hand: <S%G1448><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> you, and believe <S%G4100><s%> <S%G1722><s%> the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

Now as he walked <S%G4043><s%> by the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> and Andrew <S%G406><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> casting <S%G906><s%> a net <S%G293><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the sea: <S%G2281><s%> for they were fishers. <S%G231><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Come <S%G1205><s%> you after <S%G3694><s%> me, and I will make <S%G4160><s%> you to become <S%G1096><s%> fishers <S%G231><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>
And straightway <S%G2112><s%> they forsook <S%G863><s%> their nets, <S%G1350><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And when he had gone <S%G4260><s%> a little <S%G3641><s%> farther <S%G4260><s%> there, <S%G1564><s%> he saw <S%G1492><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> the son of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> his brother, <S%G80><s%> who <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were in the ship <S%G4143><s%> mending <S%G2675><s%> their nets. <S%G1350><s%>

And straightway <S%G2112><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> them: and they left <S%G863><s%> their father <S%G3962><s%> Zebedee <S%G2199><s%> in the ship <S%G4143><s%> with the hired <S%G3411><s%> servants, <S%G3411><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> after <S%G3694><s%> him.

And they went <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum; <S%G2584><s%> and straightway <S%G2112><s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and taught. <S%G1321><s%>

And they were astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his doctrine: <S%G1322><s%> for he taught <S%G2258><s%> <S%G1321><s%> them as one that had <S%G2192><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> and not as the scribes. <S%G1122><s%>
And there was in their synagogue <S%G4864><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> with an unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit; <S%G4151><s%> and he cried <S%G349><s%> out,

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Let <S%G1439><s%> us alone; <S%G1439><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> have we to do with you, you Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth? <S%G3478><s%> are you come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? I know <S%G1492><s%> you who <S%G5101><s%> you are, <S%G1488><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> One of God. <S%G2316><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hold <S%G5392><s%> your peace, <S%G5392><s%> and come <S%G1831><s%> out of him.
And when the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> had torn <S%G4682><s%> him, and cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> he came <S%G1831><s%> out of him.

And they were all <S%G3956><s%> amazed, <S%G2284><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they questioned <S%G4802><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G848><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> thing is this? <S%G3778><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%> is this? <S%G5124><s%> for with authority <S%G1849><s%> commands <S%G2004><s%> he even <S%G2532><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and they do obey <S%G5219><s%> him.

And immediately <S%G2117><s%> his fame <S%G189><s%> spread <S%G1831><s%> abroad <S%G1831><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the region <S%G4066><s%> round <S%G4066><s%> about <S%G4066><s%> Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>

And immediately, <S%G2112><s%> when they were come <S%G1831><s%> out of the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> they entered <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house <S%G3614><s%> of Simon <S%G4613><s%> and Andrew, <S%G406><s%> with James <S%G2385><s%> and John. <S%G2491><s%>
But Simon's <S%G4613><s%> wife's <S%G3994><s%> mother <S%G3994><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> sick <S%G4445><s%> of a fever, <S%G4445><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> they tell <S%G3004><s%> him of her.

And he came <S%G4334><s%> and took <S%G2902><s%> her by the hand, <S%G5495><s%> and lifted <S%G1453><s%> her up; and immediately <S%G2112><s%> the fever <S%G4446><s%> left <S%G863><s%> her, and she ministered <S%G1247><s%> to them.

And at even, <S%G3798><s%> <S%G1096><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> did set, <S%G1416><s%> they brought <S%G5342><s%> to him all <S%G3956><s%> that were diseased, <S%G2560><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and them that were possessed <S%G1139><s%> with devils. <S%G1139><s%>
And all <S%G3650><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was gathered <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> at <S%G4314><s%> the door. <S%G2374><s%>

And he healed <S%G2323><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that were sick <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2560><s%> of divers <S%G4164><s%> diseases, <S%G3554><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> out many <S%G4183><s%> devils; <S%G1140><s%> and suffered <S%G863><s%> not the devils <S%G1140><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G1492><s%> him.

And in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> rising <S%G450><s%> up a great <S%G3029><s%> while before <S%G1773><s%> day, <S%G1773><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out, and departed <S%G565><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a solitary <S%G2048><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> prayed. <S%G4336><s%>
And Simon <S%G4613><s%> and they that were with him followed <S%G2614><s%> after <S%G2614><s%> him.
And when they had found <S%G2147><s%> him, they said <S%G3004><s%> to him, All <S%G3956><s%> men seek <S%G2212><s%> for you.

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Let us go <S%G71><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the next <S%G2192><s%> towns, <S%G2969><s%> that I may preach <S%G2784><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> also: <S%G2546><s%> for therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> I forth. <S%G1831><s%>
And he preached <S%G2784><s%> in their synagogues <S%G4864><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> out devils. <S%G1140><s%>

And there came <S%G2064><s%> a leper <S%G3015><s%> to him, beseeching <S%G3870><s%> him, and kneeling <S%G1120><s%> down to him, and saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, If <S%G1437><s%> you will, <S%G2309><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> make <S%G2511><s%> me clean. <S%G2511><s%>

And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> moved <S%G4697><s%> with compassion, <S%G4697><s%> put <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and touched <S%G680><s%> him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, I will; <S%G2309><s%> be you clean. <S%G2511><s%>
And as soon as he had spoken, <S%G2036><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the leprosy <S%G3014><s%> departed <S%G565><s%> from him, and he was cleansed. <S%G2511><s%>
And he straightly charged <S%G1690><s%> him, and immediately <S%G2112><s%> sent <S%G1544><s%> him away; <S%G1544><s%>

And said <S%G3004><s%> to him, See <S%G3708><s%> you say <S%G2036><s%> nothing <S%G3367><s%> to any <S%G3367><s%> man: <S%G3367><s%> but go <S%G5217><s%> your way, show <S%G1166><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> to the priest, <S%G2409><s%> and offer <S%G4374><s%> for your cleansing <S%G2512><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> commanded, <S%G4367><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> to them.

But he went <S%G1831><s%> out, and began <S%G756><s%> to publish <S%G2784><s%> it much, <S%G4183><s%> and to blaze <S%G1310><s%> abroad <S%G1310><s%> the matter, <S%G3056><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> no <S%G3371><s%> more <S%G3371><s%> openly <S%G5320><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city, <S%G4172><s%> but was without <S%G1854><s%> in desert <S%G2048><s%> places: <S%G5117><s%> and they came <S%G2064><s%> to him from every <S%G3836><s%> quarter. <S%G3836><s%>
